LanguageData.CombatAI.Gizmos.AttackMove.Warning: Warning: Melee pawns cannot use move-attack. Melee pawns skipped.
LanguageData.CombatAI.Quick.Welcome.Description: This quick-setup page will help you quickly setup CAI-5000's different features!
LanguageData.CombatAI.Quick.Difficulty.Selected.Warni: WARNING: {0} difficulty level might cause performance issues!
LanguageData.CombatAI.PlaceWorker.WallMounted: Needs to be mounted to a wall or a solid structure.
LanguageData.CombatAI.Settings.Basic.RandomizedPerson: Enable variation in faction tactics depending on the faction leader and the current time of year
LanguageData.CombatAI.Settings.Basic.Temperature: Make the AI aware of cell temperature
LanguageData.CombatAI.Settings.Basic.Presets.Descript: Performance presets will determine the complexity of AI calculations and their interval. More complex calculations means harder AI but lower performance. Default is normal.
LanguageData.CombatAI.Settings.Basic.Sprinting.Descri: Allows the AI to use sprinting when dashing for cover. Turn this off if you don't like kitting simulators.
LanguageData.CombatAI.Settings.Basic.Groups.Descripti: Raiders will be divided into tactical groups (2-10) each with their own objective. Not all pawns will be assigned to groups, some will remain on the default assault duty.
LanguageData.CombatAI.Settings.Basic.SappingMul: Cost multiplier for pathing through walls (default is 1.0)
LanguageData.CombatAI.Settings.Basic.SappingMul.Descr: Cost multiplier for pathing through walls. Higher values means raiders are less likely to path through walls.
LanguageData.CombatAI.Settings.Basic.FogOfWar.OldShad: The new shader settings will be applied after restart!
LanguageData.CombatAI.Settings.Basic.FogOfWar.Animals: Colony animals reveal fog of war
Only smart animals reveal fog of war
LanguageData.CombatAI.Settings.Basic.FogOfWar.Turrets: Colony turrets reveal fog of war
LanguageData.CombatAI.Settings.Basic.FogOfWar.Density: Fog density (how dark the fog of war is)
LanguageData.CombatAI.Settings.Basic.FogOfWar.RangeMu: Fog of war sight radius multiplie (default is 1.0)
LanguageData.CombatAI.Settings.Basic.FogOfWar.FadeMul: Fog of war sight fade radius multiplier (default is 0.5)
LanguageData.CombatAI.Settings.Basic.PerformanceOpt.W: WARNING: NOT having dynamic performance settings ON will result in lag spikes and lose of performance!
LanguageData.CombatAI.Settings.Basic.PerformanceOpt.D: Automatically adjust settings to maintain both a good level of TPS and a good AI.
LanguageData.CombatAI.Settings.Basic.DestWeight.Descr: Lower numbers mean pathfinding will be more aggressive at avoiding enemies, flanking and minimizing risk to pawns.
LanguageData.CombatAI.Settings.Basic.DestWeight.Warni: WARNING: Lower values will cause alot of performance issues.
LanguageData.CombatAI.Settings.Advance.SquadPathWidth: Avoidance path width. Avoidance path width determine flanking aggressiveness.
LanguageData.CombatAI.Settings.Advance.Warning: WARNING: This is only for advanced users! Don't enable this if you don't know what you're doing!
LanguageData.CombatAI.Settings.Advance.Sight.Performa: You can adjust how many buckets pawns/turrets are divided into and how often they updates. Warning: DON'T USE THIS IF YOU DON'T KNOW WHAT YOU'RE DOING
{0} Things maximum can obstuct line of sight
The maximum number of things along line of sight. This includes trees, buildings, etc. Higher values means more accurate sight model but higher performance impact.
LanguageData.CombatAI.Settings.FactionTech.Desciption: Here you can configure factions with different tech levels.
LanguageData.CombatAI.Settings.FactionTech.Duck: Duck {0}x. Higher values means more likely to duck for cover
LanguageData.CombatAI.Settings.FactionTech.Retreat: Retreat {0}x. Higher values means more likely to retreat
LanguageData.CombatAI.Settings.FactionTech.Cover: Cover {0}x. Higher values means more aggressive cover
LanguageData.CombatAI.Settings.FactionTech.Pathing: Pathing {0}x. Higher values means more aggressive pathing
LanguageData.CombatAI.Settings.FactionTech.Sapping: Sapping {0}x. Higher values means less aggressive sapping
LanguageData.CombatAI.Settings.FactionTech.Group: Charge {0}x. Higher values means groups are more likely to charge
